text: 3.16 1 Ko 14.26, Epe 5.19, Kol 4.6 Klays takaw ne ak nab nɨbop ayaŋ aplan jakɨl tek yonɨmuŋ.3.16-17 Epe 5.19-20 Mɨdek, gos nɨgtep gɨl penpen agñɨl, takaw kɨles agɨl agñɨ tep gɨnɨmɨb. Pen nɨbi kɨmep agɨnɨg, gos nɨbi nab ayaŋ God nop nɨgɨlɨg tep agɨnɨmɨb. Buk Kɨmep takaw okok penpen agñɨlɨg, kɨmep Klays yɨb nop dad aplanub okok agɨlɨg, kɨmep God Kawnan ne ak nɨbop gos ñek okok agɨlɨg gɨnɨmɨb.
